children.name: are
children.sourceText: And they cried unto us, saying, Behold, the armies of the Lamanites are marching towards the city of Cumeni; and behold, they will fall upon them, yea, and will destroy our people.

children.name: armies
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that we did meet the spies of our armies, who had been sent out to watch the camp of the Lamanites.

children.name: arrive
children.sourceText: And behold, when they had fled and we could not overtake them, we took our march with speed towards the city Cumeni; and behold, we did arrive in time that we might assist our brethren in preserving the city.

children.name: body
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that they did in a body run upon our swords, in the which, the greater number of them were slain; and the remainder of them broke through and fled from us.
